long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Play Springy Ninja is a fun and free game right on the chrome extension with simple gameplay and easy to participate. By starting the game, hold down the mouse to stretch the jump distance and release to jump. Ninja will jump high or low depending on the distance you keep. If you jump to another pillar, you will still live, but if you fall into the river, you will die
